RESOURCE.NAME: TextCat Fingerprint Generator
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Generate language fingerprints for use with the TextCat Language Indentification PR

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set used for input/output (ignored when using the whole document)

PARAMETER.NAME: fingerprintURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The file in which the generated fingerprint should be saved

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation type covering the text to use to build the fingerprint, if unspecifed the whole document will be used

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

RESOURCE.NAME: TextCat Language Identification
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Recognizes the document language using TextCat

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: annotation set used for input/output (ignored for whole-document classification)

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: type of annotations to classify; leave blank for whole-document classification

PARAMETER.NAME: languageFeatureName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: name of document or annotation features for the language identified

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process
